title: Love Your Husband/Love Yourself: Embracing God's Purpose for Passion in Marriage
description: Would you like to take ten years off your appearance, reduce your risk of heart disease, and simultaneously divorce-proof your marriage? Are you plagued by stress-filled days and sleepless nights? Do you long for a deeper, more satisfying relationship to your spouse? Then this is the book for you. It outlines a simple but Scriptural strategy for blessing your husband that, when faithfully applied, will secure blessings beyond measure for yourself, as well. Isn’t it time you embraced God’s purpose for passion in marriage? Isn’t it time you began to unconditionally love your husband… and love yourself?
author: Jennifer Flanders
